solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public boolean isAnagram(String s, String t) {--newline--        int[] alphabet = new int[26];--newline--        for (int i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) alphabet[s.charAt(i) - 'a']++;--newline--        for (int i = 0; i < t.length(); i++) alphabet[t.charAt(i) - 'a']--;--newline--        for (int i : alphabet) if (i != 0) return false;--newline--        return true;--newline--    }--newline--}
